TBarCode Release Notes

Many thanks for installing TBarCode!

This page informs you about the most important improvements for the current TBarCode version.
Please note that updates within the same major version are free, updates to a newer major version (e.g. TBarCode 10 -> TBarCode 11) are discounted:

Current version: V11.6.0 | Previous versions: V11.5.0 | V11.4.0 | V11.3.2 | V11.3.1 | V11.3.0 | V11.2.3 | V11.2.2 | V11.2.1 | V11.2.0 | V11.1.4 | V11.1.3 | V11.1.2 | V11.1.1 | V11.1.0 | V11.0.4 | V11.0.3 | V11.0.2 | V11.0.0 | V10.2.7 | V10.2.6 | V10.2.5 | V10.2.4 | V10.2.3 | V10.2.2 | V10.2.1 | V10.2.0 | V10.1.0 | V10.0.6 | V10.0.5 | V10.0.4 | V10.0.3 | V10.0.2 Hotfix | V10.0.2 | V10.0.1 | V10.0.0 | V9.3.7 | V9.3.6 | V9.3.5 | V9.3.4 | V9.3.3 | V9.3.2 | V9.3.1 | V9.3.0 | V9.2.0 | V9.1.1 | V9.1.0 | V9.0.2 | V9.0.1 | V9.0.0



V11.6.0

Enhancements/Bug Fixes

  • HIBC Barcodes
    Updated the HIBC implementation to the current versions of the standards.
    • HIBC LIC V2.6 (Supplier Labeling Standard)
    • HIBC PAS V1.3 (Provider Applications Standard)
  • Royal Mail Mailmark® 2D
    Rename the barcode type Royal Mail CMDM Mailmark to Royal Mail Mailmark® 2D.
  • Extended Rectangular Data Matrix (DMRE)
    Add additional Data Matrix rectangular sizes (ISO/IEC AWI 21471).
  • Code Page ISO 8859-x
    Add all ISO 8859 code pages to the code page enumeration type.
  • Linux - GS1 DataBar
    Fixed a memory corruption that ocurred under Linux when generating GS1 DataBar barcodes.
  • Control Characters in SVG
    Control characters (like form feed) contained in human readable text are replaced by spaces when generating SVG code, because SVG does not allow them.
  • Code 128 - Crash
    Fixed a crash in Code 128 that occurred if the data contained characters like ² or ³.
  • Bug Fixes
    The actual version contains several minor bug fixes and stability improvements.

V11.5.0

Enhancements/Bug Fixes

  • New Barcode Type: Royal Mail Mailmark® 4-state
    The Royal Mail Mailmark® 4-state is used for identifying post items.
  • New Check Digit Method
    Added the new ISO 7064 modulus 37,2 check digit method, which is used by the ISBT-128 standard.
  • TBarCode.OCX - Font Size
    Implemented a workaround for a sizing bug in Microsoft Word and Microsoft Excel.
  • TBarCode.OCX - Composite Component
    Fixed the property IsCCPresent which informs about the presence of a composite component.
  • Bug Fixes
    The actual version contains several minor bug fixes and stability improvements.

V11.4.0

Enhancements/Bug Fixes

  • ISO 8859-1 Support for Code 128
    Code 128 now supports the whole character set defined by ISO 8859-1.
  • Bar Width Reduction
    The bar width reduction algorithm was improved. Bars are now reduced on all sides, gaps between adjacent dots in matrix codes are now avoided.
  • Plessey Code
    Fixed a memory leak that occurred in the context of Plessey Code.
  • PDF File Export
    Fixed a potential crash that could occur in error case.

V11.3.2

Enhancements/Bug Fixes

  • New Application Icon
    TBarCode SDK now uses a new application icon.
  • Samples - Barcode Service
    A new example was added to the setup that demonstrates how to generate barcodes using a service.
  • Samples and Guides
    The TBarCode SDK samples and guides were revised.
  • Setup on 32-bit Windows
    A bug in the setup application was fixed which prevented TBarCode SDK from installing on 32-bit Windows systems.
  • Micro QR-Code: Memory Leak
    A memory leak was fixed that occurred when drawing a Micro QR-Code symbol.
  • Bug Fixes
    The actual version contains several minor bug fixes and stability improvements.

V11.3.1

Enhancements

  • Support of Data Matrix Rectangular Extension (DMRE)
    The symbol sizes defined by the DMRE (DIN 16587) are now supported by the SDK: 8x48, 8x64, 12x64, 16x64, 24x32, 24x36, 24x48, 24x64 and 26x32.
  • New Barcode Type: UPU S10
    UPU S10 is used for identifying postal items. It is a generic barcode type that was implemented by several postal authorities.
  • Check Digit Method Modulo 43 for QR-Code and Data Matrix
    The check digit method "modulo 43" is provided in the list of supported check digit methods for QR-Code and Data Matrix.
  • New Setup Application
    A new setup application is used, which contains both the 32 Bit and 64 Bit components. It downloads and installs the C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2015 on demand.

V11.3.0

Enhancements/Bug Fixes

  • TBarCode.NET - Memory Leak
    Fixed a memory leak in method Barcode_Drawing.DrawBitmap.
  • MS Office - Crash
    Fixed a potential crash when finishing MS Office Applications that use TBarCode.ocx.
  • TBarCode.OCX - QR-Code
    Fixed a bug when activating structured append in the property dialog.
  • Aztec Code
    Fixed a bug concerning the format specifier in Industry Format.
  • VS2015
    Migrated build to Visual Studio 2015.
  • GS1 Application Identifier
    Bring the list of application identifiers (AIs) up to date.

V11.2.3

Enhancements/Bug Fixes

  • Codabar 2
    Fixed a bug in check digit calculation that occurred if start and stop characters were to be excluded.
  • Application Identifiers
    Bring the list of application identifiers (AIs) up to date.

V11.2.2

Enhancements/Bug Fixes

  • New Checkdigit Method: Modulo-11 (W=9)
    This check digit method is modulo-11 based with a maximum weight of 9. It can be used with code Interleaved 2 of 5.
  • Royal Mail CMDM
    Fixed an encoding bug that occurred if no custom data was available.

V11.2.1

Enhancements/Bug Fixes

  • DotCode: New Size Mode
    The user may now specify the number of columns and rows.
  • DotCode: Choose Preferred Codeset
    The user can now choose the preferred codeset for encoding a DotCode symbol. This can be done via option string.
  • VIN Check Digit
    The check digit calculation for the VIN code was fixed.

V11.2.0

Enhancements/Bug Fixes

  • New Barcode Type
    Added new barcode type Royal Mail CMDM Mailmark®.
  • New Checkdigit Method
    Added new check digit method Modulo 11 UPU (Universal Post Union).
  • New Output Formats
    Two new ouptut formats are now supported: SVG and AI (Adobe Illustrator V7).
  • Character Spacing
    TBarCode DLL and TBarCode.NET now support character spacing. TBarCode OCX will contain this feature with next major release.
  • DotCode
    Extend automatic mask selection to avoid gaps in the symbol.
  • Pharma Code
    Fixed bugs concerning bar coloring for Pharma Code 1.
  • Composite Barcodes
    Sizes of composite components were fixed.
  • PDF Output
    Fixed the line length in the xref lines of generated PDF documents. Added PDF output format to .NET component.

V11.1.4

Bug Fixes

  • Aztec Code
    Fixed problems with code switching that might lead to an unoptimzied symbol or to error message "input string too long".

V11.1.3

Enhancements

  • PDF417
    Added most common Macro PDF417 options to the bar code options string (BCSetOptions).

V11.1.2

Enhancements

  • PDF417
    Allow the use of ECI/GLI also at the begin of binary compression mode.

Bug Fixes

  • Aztec Code
    TBC-5669: Problem with code switching that led to the error message "input string too long".

V11.1.1

Enhancements

  • GetOptimalBitmapSize (OCX)
    TBC-5540: GetOptimalBitmapSize now accepts default values for width and height. The interface was changed to support IN/OUT parameters.
  • DotCode
    TBC-5529: Improved error message for DotCode Format GS1.
  • TBarCode/Java
    TBC-5527: The TBarCode JNI library was updated to TBarCode Library V11.

Bug Fixes

  • Micro-PDF417
    TBC-5586: Micro-PDF417 encodes only garbage (when starting in default byte compaction mode). The problem exists since V7.0.1.
  • GetOptimalBitmapSize (OCX)
    TBC-5374: GetOptimalBitmapSize returns too much height (in case of HRT enabled).
  • Property Page (OCX)
    TBC-3326: Cannot change DPI in OCX Property Page if size mode <> minimal module width.
  • GetTextAreaHeightImg (OCX)
    TBC-5539: Handle leak in GetTextAreaHeightImg (the fix may increase stability in Barcode ASP).
  • BCGetOptimalBitmapSize (DLL)
    TBC-5443: Improved algorithm for DPI > 96 and user specific quiet zones [Pixels]. Fix is also relevant for the OCX and .NET component.

V11.1.0

Enhancements / Bug Fixes

  • New Barcode Type: Swedish Postal Shipment Item ID
    A Code 128-based barcode type used by the Swedish Postal Services.
  • New Checkdigit Method: Modulo-11 (W=10)
    This check digit method is modulo-11 based with a maximum weight of 10. It can be used with Code 39.
  • Bar Width Reduction
    Added option "Bar Width Reduction Legacy Mode" that disables the conjunction of neighboring dots in matrix codes.
  • Bug Fix: Check Digit Method Mod-11 (PZN)
    Using this method with other barcode types than PZN-7/8 now returns an error code.

V11.0.4

Enhancements / Bug Fixes

  • Default Shape Function
    Added a function to the API that returns the default shape for the currently set barcode type.
  • Code 39 / Code 39 Full Ascii
    Fixed a bug concerning the calculation of check digits when also auto-correction is applied to the input data.
  • Bitmap Generation
    The function BCBitmapToFile now draws bars again with the correct size.

V11.0.3

Enhancements

  • GS1 DataBar Limited
    TEC-IT changed the implementation of the barcode type GS1 DataBar Limited due to the newest specification (right quiet zone = 5X).
  • EAN Codes
    Added option "Legacy Drawing Mode".
  • Codabar
    Added option whether to consider start/stop characters for check digit calculation.
  • GS1 - AI255
    The application identifier 255 Global Coupon Number is supported.

Bug Fixes

  • DotCode
    Draw very small dots as rectangles to avoid that they cannot be drawn.
  • Code 128
    An encoding bug that might occur when a control character followed a lower case character (e.g. "1234a\x04") was fixed.
  • Property Bar Shape
    Avoid a potential crash if "Image" is selected as bar shape type and the given image cannot be loaded.
  • Double Check Digits
    Fixed a crash that occurred when calculating 2 check digits at once. Affected are the barcode types MSI and Plessey.
  • GS1 DataBar Expanded and GS1 DataBar Expanded Stacked
    A bug concerning application identifiers was fixed. The encoder problem occurred with AI 01 + "9nnnnnnnnnnnnn" + AI 310x + nnnnnn and AI 01 + "9nnnnnnnnnnnnn" + AI 320x + nnnnnn.
  • Optimal Bitmap Size
    Fixed a bug in optimal bitmap size calculation: BCGetOptimalBitmapSize returned wrong width/height if DPI <> 96.
  • License Calculation
    Fixed a bug in license calculation that occurred on some systems.
  • Auto correction
    Auto correction with Code-128 removed all leading FNC1 (at least one FNC1 should be kept).

V11.0.2

Enhancements

  • Data Matrix
    Added option "Prefer ASCII encoding".

Bug Fixes

  • Barcode Size
    Fixed size calculation for barcodes with an orientation of other than 0°.
  • Correct Text Parameter in Callback Function
    The correct human readable text is now passed to the callback function in TBarCode.NET.
  • ASP Sample
    The ASP sample now uses the correct type library.

V11.0.0 / V11.0.1

New Barcode Types

  • Han Xin Code
    A 2D matrix code with special support for the Chinese character set GB18030. It has a capacity of up to 4350 ASCII characters.
  • DotCode
    A rectangular 2D code which encodes data in an array of nominally disconnected dots. The dots are aligned diagonal on a grid. It supports data formats like GS1 Application Identifiers, several industry formats end data envelops.
  • USPS Intelligent Mail Package
    Is a GS1-128-based, linear barcode, which is used by United States Postal Service for delivering packages. It is split into routing and tracking information but only the tracking information is printed in the human readable text. It is verified by a special Modulo-10 check digit.

Enhancements

  • Custom Draw Methods
    Barcode bars can now be drawn as ellipses, rounded rectangles, and images additionally to the "common" rectangles.
  • PDF Output
    PDF output was improved to be able to support the new draw methods and some bugs in the content table were fixed.
  • Licensing on 64-bit machines
    A bug concerning finding the license data on 64-bit machines was fixed.
  • Quiet Zone Color
    The quiet zones may now be filled with colors different to the barcodes background color.
  • Overprinting
    EPS output now supports overprinting.

Bug Fixes

  • Aztec Code
    Fixed a coding problem where correct input data led to an error message.
  • Reset Locale
    Fixed settings and resetting of the internal locale.

V10.2.7

Bug Fixes

  • PDF417
    A bug concerning the barcode capacity was fixed.
  • Licensing
    A licensing bug was fixed that was introduced in an intermediate version.

V10.2.6

Bug Fixes

  • Japanese Postal Barcode
    Fixed wrong encoding of letters. Fixed errors in address compaction mode with specific characters (char codes FAxx/FBxx/FCxx in CP932). Added Shift JIS as default code page.
  • BCCheck
    Fixed bug for ISBN, ISMN, and ISSN codes. '-' is now accepted.

V10.2.5

Bug Fixes

  • Aztec Code
    Fixed a bug concerning switching to binary mode.
  • Callback Functions
    Callback function for drawing bars is not called if either width or height of the bar are invalid.

V10.2.4

Bug Fixes

  • Aztec Code
    Fixed a bug concerning the encoding of the last character and the filler bits at the end of the code. Under special constellations the last character was encoded wrong.
  • .NET - DrawBitmap
    The method DrawBitmap handles the properties DPI and IsBackgroundTransparent now correctly.
  • GS1 Databar Stacked Omnidirectional
    Fixed drawing of barcode type GS1 Databar Stacked OmniDir by removing a single empty pixel line within the barcode.

V10.2.3

Bug Fixes

  • Saving Images in GIF Format
    A potential multithreading problem concerning saving an image in GIF-format was removed.
  • Codepages
    Now the correct default codepage CP437 for PDF417 Truncated is used. Invalid characters for the selected codepage now lead to an error message.
  • Bar Width Reduction
    Bar width reduction property is saved correctly.

V10.2.2

Bug Fixes

  • License / Operating System Version
    The version of the operating system (32-bit or 64-bit) is now displayed correctly in the license dialog.

V10.2.0 / V10.2.1

Enhancements

  • Aztec Code
    Improved the encoding efficiency in order to minimize the bar code size.
  • Barcode Types PZN8, Code 32
    The new barcode types PZN8 (Pharmazentralnummer with 8 digits) and Code 32 (Italian Pharmacode) were implemented.
  • Improved Encoding for Data Matrix
    The mode switching algorithm for Data Matrix was improved.
  • Check Digit Methods
    The check digit method Modulo 10 Luhn is now available for Code39 and Codabar 2 Width.
    The check digit method Modulo 23 for PPSN is now available for Code 128.
  • Bar Width Reduction
    The bar width reduction algorithm for 2D matrix barcodes was improved.

Bug Fixes

  • Modulo 10 (Luhn Algorithm)
    A calculation problem with check the digit method Modulo 10 (Luhn Algorithm) was fixed.
  • -Character in Extra Texts
    The character  can now be shown in the extra texts.
  • Barcode Type ITF14
    The print ratio was corrected.
  • HIBC LIC Codablock-F, HIBC PAS Codablock-F
    Fixed a bug, when the optimize resolution flag has been set.
  • OCX - Memory Leak in ConvertToStream
    Fixed a potential memory leak in the method ConvertToStream.
  • Windows XP - UTF-8 encoding
    An bug with UTF-8 encoding on older Windows systems (Windows XP and previous) was fixed.
  • x64 - TBarCode10.Lib
    The TBarCode 32-bit import library TBarCode10.Lib is now available in the 64-bit setup.
  • DLL - BCBitmapToMemory
    The function BCBitmapToMemory works now even if a NULL-handle is passed.
  • .NET - CalculateCheckdigits
    The return value of the method CalculateCheckdigits is now correctly delimited.
  • Aztec Code
    Fixed the encoding of special data sequences.
  • Codabar
    Check digit calculation now considers the start and stop character positions correctly.
  • Bearer Bars
    Calculation of space between bearer bars and barcode has been improved and works now also for rotated barcodes.

V10.1.0

Enhancements

  • Barcode Type Brazilian CEPNet
    The barcode type Brazilian CEPNet was implemented.
  • Barcode Type VIN / FIN (Vehicle Identification Number)
    The barcode type VIN / FIN was implemented.

V10.0.6

Bug Fixes

  • Missing Last Row in DrawRow Callback with RSS Stacked Codes
    Error occurred only if DrawRow was used without DrawBar and DrawText. The behavior could be a missing row or an access violation.

V10.0.5

Enhancements

  • EPS Font Selection
    Support font style 'bold' and 'italic' in EPS output if EpsSubstwDeviceFonts is enabled. Remove spaces from font names if EpsSubstwDeviceFonts has been disabled.
  • PCL Font Selection
    Allow case insensitive font selection (support "Courier" and "courier"). Support specifying the PCL font typeface number and bold style directly in the font name (e.g. "4148p Bold", "4099f"). Use font style 'bold' as well if font weight bold has been set in the LOGFONT structure (BCSetLogFont).

Bug Fixes

  • PCL5 (HP-GL/2) Output
    The label orientation (LO.. parameter) is now reset to printer default (LO1) after text output. Without this fix, the label orientation stays in centered or right aligned mode after bar code output.
  • TIFF Output on Linux 64 Bit
    Fixed a core dump which occurred when creating TIFF images with Linux 64 Bit binaries (TBarCode/X, Libtbarcode).

V10.0.4

Enhancements and Bugfixes

  • Enhancement: Encoding Errors
    Changed error code for unsupported iconv encodings to "Invalid code page or invalid characters" (0x8007203C)

V10.0.3

Enhancements and Bugfixes

  • Enhancement: HIBC Codes
    Adapted the validation of HIBC codes to the latest standard.
  • Enhancement: GS1 - Default Values
    Improved the default data content for codes of the GS1 family.
  • Enhancement: EAN.UCC Composite - GS1 Composite
    Renamed EAN.UCC Composite to GS1 Composite.
  • Enhancement: New Samples
    Added a WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation) and a Delphi 2010 sample to the setup.
  • Bugfix: ASP Sample
    Corrected the GUID for the TBarCode Type Library.

V10.0.2 Hotfix (28.09.2010)

Enhancements and Bugfixes

  • Bugfix: Setup Error on Windows XP
    Fixed bug that prevented TBarCode to be installed on some Windows XP systems (Setup Error: Failed to open XML file  system error -214702478).
  • Enhancement: .NET Wrapper File Version
    The build number is now added to the file version of the .NET wrapper.

V10.0.2

Enhancements and Bugfixes

  • Enhancement: Data Matrix - DP Postmatrix
    The list of formats for the Data Matrix symbology was extended by "Deutsche Post Postmatrix".
  • Bugfix: Escape Sequences
    Fixed bugs concerning decimal and octal escape sequences.
  • Bugfix: Check Digits
    The error message for wrong check digits was corrected for following bar code types: EAN8 + 2 Digits, NVE 18, SSCC 18.
  • Bugfix: OCX / 64-bit Windows
    Solved a problem that occurred with TBarCode OCX on 64-bit Windows. Replaced functions parameters of type LONG_PTR with parameters of type VARIANT, which work with both 32-bit and 64-bit applications.

V10.0.1

Enhancements

  • SCANPAY Barcodes
    The two SCANPAY barcode types SCANPAY Service-ID and SCANPAY Transaction-ID were implemented.
  • Code Pages
    An error message is shown if the barcode data cannot be translated into given code page.

Bug Fixes

  • UPC E
    Corrected the quiet zones.
  • OCX - CopyToClipboardEx
    The resolution of the given device context is now considered.
  • Error Messages
    Error message was wrong if format string was invalid for given barcode type.

V10.0.0

New Barcode Types

  • QR-Code 2005
    A newer variant of QR-Code that uses ISO-5589-1 (Latin-1) as default character encoding.
  • ISBN 13 / ISBN 13 with 5 digits add-on
    The ISBN 13 bar code with 5 add-on digits is used for encoding ISBN numbers that are used in the book industry for retail and wholesale applications.
  • ISMN
    The ISMN (International Standard Music Number) bar code is used for encoding ISMN numbers that identify printed music.
  • ISSN / ISSN with 2 digits add-on
    The ISSN (International Standard Serial Number) bar code is used for encoding ISSN numbers that identify printed or electronic periodical publications.
  • USPS Intelligent Mail® Barcode
    The bar code type, which was formerly known by its old names USPS 4-State Customer Barcode or USPS One Code, was renamed to its actual name USPS Intelligent Mail® Barcode.
  • GTIN-14 / ITF 14, EAN 14
    Renamed the barcode types ITF 14 to ITF 14 (GTIN 14) and EAN 14 to EAN 14 (GTIN 14).

New Check Digit Methods

  • Modulo 10 (Luhn Algorithm)
    A new check digit method called Modulo 10 (Luhn Algorithm) has been added.

Features/Enhancements

  • Additional Text Property
    Additional human readable texts (e.g. comments) can now be added to the barcode programmatically. The texts can be positioned, aligned, rotated, etc.
  • TBarCode / x86, x64
    TBarCode and TBarCode x64 can now be installed in parallel on Windows x64 systems. The TBarCode .NET wrapper loads the native TBarCode library depending on the project settings (x86, x64).
  • UNICODE / Callbacks
    The text callback function now supports UNICODE.
  • Module Width
    The module width can now be set in double precision. Important: Specify the module with still in 1/1000 mm; the value 1000.0 results in a module width of 1 mm.
  • Bearer Bars / Quiet Zone
    If the quiet zone is too small for drawing rectangular bearer bars, an error message is displayed.
  • Quiet Zone / Background Color
    The background color is now also drawn behind the quiet zones.
  • PCL Export
    Implemented minimalistic font handling support for PCL export.
  • TBarCode .NET - Web Control, Color Depth
    Introduced a new property ColorDepth to the web control.
  • Optimal Bitmap Size / Quiet Zones
    Function BCGetOptimalBitmapSize now considers the quiet zones.
  • Function DrawBitmap
    Introduced a new implementation of DrawBitmap that uses the property BoundingRectangles as image size.
  • GS1 128 - Application Identifiers
    Updated the list of the supported application identifiers.
  • New property IsCCPresent
    A new property IsCCPresent (Is Composite Code Present?) was introduced.
  • New properties/methods BarcodeTypes, GetDefaultDataByType, CheckDigitMethods
    Introduced the new properties/methods BarcodeTypes (list of barcode type names), GetDefaultDataByType (default data for given barcode type), and CheckDigitMethods (list of check digit method names).
  • Image Type EPS
    Images of type EPS are now generated as vector based graphics instead of embedded bitmaps. The size of the resulting images is smaller and the generation more efficient.
  • Data as Hexadecimal Values
    Introduced a new encoding mode that converts input data given as hexadecimal values to binary data.

Bug Fixes

  • MS Word - Property List
    Fixed a crash when opening the property dialog from the property list in MS Word.
  • USPS Intelligent Mail® Barcode
    Fixed a check digit bug.
  • Clipping of the human readable text
    Unnecessary clipping of the human readable text was turned off.
  • OCX - DPI value not saved
    Changes of the DPI value in the property dialog are now saved.
  • Copy To Clipboard / Font Sizes
    Corrected the font size calculation in the copy to clipboard function.
  • Optimal Resolution / Barcode Width
    The barcode width is now calculated correctly when optimal resolution is set.
  • Changed Locale Settings
    Changing of the system locale does not affect the correctness of the bar code content anymore.
  • Quiet Zone
    Fixed a bug that occurred when the quiet zone was set on more than one side for 2D codes.
  • TBarCode .NET / Fonts
    The marshalling of the Font property was corrected.
  • Word/Excel 2007: Font Settings
    Fixed a bug that font setting were not saved in Word/Excel 2007 and newer.
  • TBarCode OCX - Undo in Word 2007 resets properties
    Fixed a bug in TBarCode OCX that resets the bar code properties after undo.

Known Problems

  • TBarCode .NET - TBarCode ignores transformations to the Graphics object
    Changes to the Graphics object are not considered by TBarCode. That's because the Graphics object bases on GDI+ and TBarCode makes its drawing by using GDI (on a device context). When the Graphics object is converted to a device context handle, all transformations are lost.

V9.3.7

Enhancements and Bug Fixes

  • Bug Fix - OCX / Fixed loading problems concerning Microsoft Word and Microsoft Excel.
    Problems concerning loading TBarCode OCX in Microsoft Word and Microsoft Excel were fixed. The problems occurred after following security updates:
    • Microsoft Office Word 2003 (security update KB982134)
    • Microsoft Office Word 2007 (security update KB982135)
    • Microsoft Office Excel 2003 (security update KB982133)
    • Microsoft Office Excel 2007 (security update KB982308)

V9.3.6

Enhancements and Bug Fixes

  • Bug Fix - DLL / BCSetMirror
    BCSetMirror didn't work. This bug was fixed.

V9.3.5

Enhancements and Bug Fixes

  • Bug Fix - Telepen / Telepen Alpha
    Fixed a bug concerning the check digit calculation in Telepen / Telepen Alpha.

V9.3.4

Enhancements and Bug Fixes

  • Bug Fix - Code128/EAN128/GS1-128
    Fixed an endless loop that could occur when encoding FNC1 in Code128/EAN128/GS1-128.

V9.3.3

Enhancements and Bug Fixes

  • Bug Fix - EAN13
    Fixed a bug concerning the changes of previous version.

V9.3.2

Enhancements and Bug Fixes

  • Bug Fix - EAN/UPC Codes
    Improved the printing quality of the digits 1, 2, 7, and 8.
  • Bug Fix - Code 128
    Improved mode switching in context with the FNC1 character.
  • Bug Fix - Missing Error Message
    Error Message for error code Wrong Check Digit was added.
  • Bug Fix - Office Add-In
    Fixed a crash in Replace Pattern feature.

V9.3.1

Enhancements and Bug Fixes

  • Bug Fix - Multi Threading / Postscript
    Fixed a multi threading problem in conjunction with Postscript generation.
  • Bug Fix - Minimum Size of web control
    The minimum size for TBarCode.NET web controls was reduced.
  • Documentation Updated
    The redistribution information in the developer documentations was updated.

V9.3.0

Enhancements and Bug Fixes

  • Check Digits - Error Message
    Improved the error message that is displayed if the user enters an incorrect check digit.
  • Bug Fix - Data Matrix / GS1
    Fixed FNC1 encoding bug.
  • Bug Fix - Bar Code Height
    The bar code height is now calculated correctly with a rotation of 270°.
  • Bug Fix - Binary Data in .NET
    Binary Data is now passed correctly to the TBarCode Library.
  • Bug Fix - Product ID in .NET
    The product enumeration type uses the correct product ID (on 32-bit and 64-bit machines).
  • Documentation - Data Matrix Format
    The descriptions of the Data Matrix Format enumeration values in the TBarCode Library Reference were improved.

V9.2.0

Enhancements and Bug Fixes

  • Image Export - Special Characters in File Names
    Images can now be exported to paths or file names that contain special characters
    (characters that are not part of the ANSI code page).
  • Bug Fix - Quiet Zones
    The left quiet zone of several 2D bar codes is now drawn correctly when the unit "Modules" is selected.
  • Bug Fix - Data Matrix
    Internal code optimization was improved.

V9.1.1

Enhancements and Bug Fixes

  • Bug Fix - GetOptimalBitmapSize in OCX
    Bar code sizes are now recalculated during each call.
  • Bug Fix - Drawing in HIMETRIC resolution
    Bounding rectangle is now handled correctly.
  • Bug Fix - Font size problem in TBarCode for .NET
    The font size is now set correctly in the Draw method (image export).
  • Default bar code type
    The default bar code size may now be set via INI-file.
  • Bug Fix - Continuous redrawing in TBarCode OCX
    Fixed redrawing problem if an error occurs.
  • Bug Fix - Escape sequences in Format string
    Escape sequences are now handled even if they are located in the format string.

V9.1.0

Enhancements and Bug Fixes

  • Check Digits
    Wrong check digits in the bar code data result in an error.
  • Bug Fix - BCSaveImage/Ex
    Images are always generated with the correct resolution.
  • UNICODE characters in file names
    The BCSaveImage/Ex method now accepts UNICODE characters in the file name.
  • Bug Fix - Barcodes with a width of 9000 pixels and more
    TBarCode OCX is now able to generate images with a width/height of more than 9000 pixels.
  • Bug Fix - TBarCode for .NET x86
    32-bit version of .NET control works also on x64 systems.

V9.0.2

Enhancements and Bug Fixes

  • Licensing
    The license data is trimmed from white spaces.
  • Bug Fix - ITF-14: Wrong Plaintext
    The plaintext of ITF-14 codes was not formatted correctly.
  • Bug Fix - HIBC LIC Codes
    Data check failed in certain cases even if data was correct.

V9.0.1

Enhancements and Bug Fixes

  • Spanish Version
    A Spanish version of TBarCode was released.
  • Bug Fix - X64 Version: Licensing Bug
    Used the incorrect product key for the X64 version.
  • Adding the name GS1 to EAN/UCC formats

V9.0.0

New Barcode Types

  • Micro QR-Code
    2D symbology with binary encoding support.
  • Health Industry Bar Codes
    These barcodes are provided for encoding Label Identification Codes (LIC) and Provider Applications Standards (PAS) as used in the health industry:
    • HIBC LIC/PAS 128
    • HIBC LIC/PAS 39
    • HIBC LIC/PAS Data Matrix
    • HIBC LIC/PAS QR-Code
    • HIBC LIC/PAS PDF417
    • HIBC LIC/PAS MicroPDF417
    • HIBC LIC/PAS CODABLOCK-F
  • Full implementation of Aztec Code
    All encoding types are supported now.

Features/Enhancements

  • Improved Quiet Zone Adjustment
    The quiet zone works for all barcodes now. It can be specified in modules, mm, mils and pixels. All four sides may be adjusted separately.
  • Improved Bar Width Reduction Adjustment
    The bar width reduction uses decimals and lets the user choose between several units (percent, mm, mils and pixel).
  • Bitmap Size for Export
    New function for calculating the optimal bitmap sizes for export.
  • Compressed Data Size
    New function for retrieving the length of compressed barcode data.
  • PDF Output
    Barcodes can now be saved in PDF format.
  • Data Matrix
    Added the possibility to enforce binary encoding.
  • RSS and GS1 DataBar
    Changed the naming of 'RSS' barcodes to 'GS1 DataBar'.
  • OCX Property Dialog
    In the property dialog 'Notch Height' was replaced by 'Bar Width Reduction'.

Bug Fix

  • Bitmap Export
    The resolution for barcodes with more than 300 dpi is now stored correctly into barcode images (e.g. JPEG, PNG).
  • Bitmap Export in Compatible Draw Mode
    Fixed a problem with the bar width when creating EMF images in 'Compatible' draw mode.
  • Pharmacode
    Fixed a problem related to the encoding of color sequences.
  • KIX Barcode
    Right aligned text is now properly aligned.
  • Composite Component
    Fixed an issue with the adjustment of composite components in the standard property list (Microsoft Word, Excel, …).
